mapper.select: select hostel_code as hostelCode, hostel_name as hostelName, book_start as bookStart, book_end as bookEnd, hostel_score as hostelScore from hostel where member_no = #{memberNo}

select ticket_no as ticketNo, member_no as memberNo, start_date as startDate, expire_date as expireDate, ticket_title as ticketTitle, ticket_content as ticketContent, important_content as importantContent, business_time as businessTime, business_addr as businessAddr, required_time as requiredTime, like_count as likeCount, ticket_score as ticketScore from ticket where member_no=#{memberNo}
